text:
Unpaid carers will now be called forward for their first jabs in this next phase of the #COVID19 #vaccine roll-out.

Please ensure you are registered with your GP as a carer so you are invited. Contact your GP for details.

More https://t.co/LIjOeRyO3Y 
@CarersUK #JabsforCarers https://t.co/NiEf55P8MM
